features: MODERN STYLE: Give your workplace a professional look with this stylish Serta Office Chair
ALL DAY COMFORT: Plush cushions keep you comfortable for long periods of sitting
ERGONOMIC DESIGN: Contoured lumbar zone provides extra lower-back support
JUST THE RIGHT FIT: Adjustable seat height, recline angle, and tilt tension
BUILT TO LAST: Heavy-duty five-star base and durable dual-wheel casters
body.description: Add a touch of modern style to your workplace with this comfortable office chair from Serta. This plush desk chair is upholstered in bonded leather and features layered body pillows that keep you cradled in comfort while working or gaming. It has a contoured lumbar design to provide your lower back with exceptional support. This ergonomic office chair also offers a pneumatic seat-height lift, a recline mechanism, and adjustable tilt tension. This Serta office chair is built to last with a heavy-duty five-star base and durable multi-surface casters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A nice chair at a fair price.
reviews.reviewText: I've had a few of what I consider economy office chairs. I'm impressed with the sturdy build of this Serta. The adjustment knob under the seat works great for regulating the degree of tension while reclining. I have no illusions about the longevity of the bonded leather. I hope to get two to three years before the inevitable pealing begins, and a few more before it's an eyesore. Until then I think it will be a comfortable chair. The padding is generous, the lumbar is firm and the quality is better than expected at this price point. Assembly was simple. Not sure why some reviewers have had difficulty. A half hour job at the most.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect office chair!
reviews.reviewText: I work from home, 10 hour days, and needed a new chair that was comfy. But let’s face it…I wanted it to be pretty too! I took a chance and ordered this chair and it came today. The instructions for putting it together were super easy, and it didn’t take me too long to get it all set up. It’s super comfy, and the fabric is the perfect shade of pink. The upholstery is soft and I definitely wanted something fabric…I’m in Florida and my old leather chair would make me sweat like crazy. That chair is also a Serta so I knew it would be good quality. Definitely recommend if your looking for something comfy, sturdy and cute!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice chair but not microfiber
reviews.reviewText: I love the color, don't mind the material, like the comfort of it but it is not microfiber. Regular cloth material. Arrived on time but we were surprised it came USPS not UPS or Fed-Ex. Mail carrier did drop it but the box was almost twice her size plus it didn't hurt the chair at all. Easy to quickly put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I'm very happy with this chair so far and it's comfortable. I just got it so time will tell how well it holds up to daily use. It was easy to put together. Only took about 15/20 minutes to assemble.It has a decent amount of padding for the back and butt. The arms could have a bit more padding but they aren't uncomfortable.The height adjustment works well. The reclining is a bit stiff and difficult to do, but it might be because it's new. The wheels roll around with no problems.The fabric stitching is good. The fabric isn't as soft feeling as I thought it would be. It's a tiny bit on the scratchy side. It does seem to be decent quality though. It's not solid black but closer to a charcoal gray color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: To be honest, it's not as comfortable as I thought it would be the lumbar support on the bottom could be better. I plan on getting a squishy pillow to put there. I'm a short 52 and it's sitting all the way to the bottom. I thought that it reclined maybe I'm wrong. I did not go back and read the box, but it does not as far as I know, I didn't figure it out. If I figure it out I will tell you later it's 30 it is comfortable except for my lumbar area. I'm not impressed like I thought that would be but it's OK. The color pink is beautiful.

reviews.reviewerName: The most comfortable office chair I’ve ever owned
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The most comfortable office chair I’ve ever used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely the WORST purchase I have ever made
reviews.reviewText: Looks good in the pictures and day one was mildly comfortable. DO NOT BUY this if you plan to use it. DO NOT BUY this if you are working from home. I honestly have not been this disappointed in a purchase from amazon ever. $171 dollars out the window. I cannot come up with the words to describe how pathetic and junky this product is. It is very obvious the manufacturer had every intention of ripping of the customer. Why so disappointed? I purchased this product on June 15, 2020 to replace an old chair because I started working from home due to COVID. Within weeks the seat pad is down to nothing and I had to buy a Amazon memory foam pad to help out my rear. It would hurt after sitting for more then a couple hours, worse then sitting on a metal chair. Next the material on the arms is too rough and textured, I find my self with irritated elbows by the end of the day. Then it began making all kinds of noises here recently, squeaking and creaking noises. And now finally the chair height is lowering and now longer holds its position. I weigh 195 pounds NOT 500. Today, November 11, 2020 I am chairing shopping again. Total garbage product. PLEASE DO NOT BUY!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Chair for the Price
reviews.reviewText: I work remotely so it’s important to have a chair of comfort at my desk working mon-fri. In the beginning, I bought a cheap chair from Walmart and that failed to provide comfort. So I opted for this executive chair off Amazon and the comfort is amazing! It wasn’t difficult to set up neither which is a bonus! If you need a good chair, get the chair. You won’t regret it!

The first part I pulled out of the box is completely smashed. Amazon DOES NOT OFFER RETURNS on this product due to "health and safety" even though I've only pulled out one piece. Serta Canada can't do anything because it's an American model. Serta USA won't do anything because they don't actually build these chairs. Now talking to the third party. Hopefully I can get a replacement part or else this was $220 down the drain.
don't get the bad reviews I love this chair have a bad back and this feels great
Por calidad precio muy recomendable, es lo que esperaba. Además fácil de armar en unos 20 minutos con única herramienta incluida (llave Allen). Recomendable 100%

its good! Not sure if it's actually microfiber. I originally said its not for short people. But there was actually black wax on the adjuster that I had to clean off for it to go down more. Putting it together was mostly easy except the back was really hard and I had to wrap myself awkwardly around the seat to put it on. Its comfy and fairly cute.When assembling the black wax or whatever it is also rubbed onto the seat from the armrests so there's some black marks on the side. They aren't too noticable.

Esta muy bien todo, pero por el precio si esperaba excelencia en funcionalidad, aun asi todo muy muy bien.Nada ha fallado es reclinable toda la silla y sin problema, es bastante comoda incluso por horas, es mas elegante en la vida real que en la foto hasta da la impresión de ser otra silla, la desviación ala derecha del asiento es de milímetros asi que en realidad es un detalle absurdo ya que después de meses se ha mantenido funcionando al 100.
